Hospital.Controllers

Class WorldController

  • java.lang.Object
    • Hospital.Controllers.WorldController

  • public class WorldController
extends java.lang.Object
    This controller gives controlled access to the world it represents. This controllers enables the following use-cases: Login : gives the necessary information to the UI and the login-function Register Patient: returns the list of all registered Patients returns the list of all Campusses that have food for the patient setPreference: gives a list of all preference types. openPatientFile: gives a list of all undischarged patients

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      WorldController(World w)
      This creates a WorldController for the given World

      • login

        public LoginController login(CampusInfo campus,
                    LoginInfo person)
                      throws NoPersonWithNameAndRoleException,
                             ArgumentIsNullException,
                             ArgumentConstraintException
        Logs the person represented by the given LoginInfo in.
        Parameters:
        campus - The campus to login at.
        person - The LoginInfo to log a person in with
        Returns:
        the LoginController that represents the person for this session.
        Throws:
        NoPersonWithNameAndRoleException - if the person was not found/does not exist
        ArgumentIsNullException - if the given person was null
        ArgumentConstraintException - the campus was not found in the world
